website_summaries.verdict: The Crossknit 2.0 is a living proof that new isn’t necessarily bad. The modern design and technologies of the shoe are an out-of-the-box concept that is slowly embraced by the golfing community. Because it meshes style and performance, most consider it as a must-buy despite minor glitches.
pros: A great number of users are satisfied with the general performance of the Adidas Crossknit 2.0
Its contemporary and casual design are well-loved by many consumers
A great deal of golfers feel that they have stretched their buck by using the Crossknit 2.0 as their everyday shoe
The unique lacing system catches the attention of various wearers
It makes the foot secure when making a swing
Several Adidas golf shoe fans are not disappointed with the full-length Boost midsole
Because of the knitted upper, a significant amount of buyers have said that it works excellently during summer
The spikeless outsole holds up on different surface conditions like the driving range, golf course, and snow, say numerous reviewers
Adidas patrons report that because the shoe is extremely lightweight, wearing it feels like wearing socks
cons: Because the sock-like construction is quite hard, it chaffs the ankle, according to many users
One expected it to wear it like a sock but was disappointed that it required more effort
Compared to the Ultraboost and Pureboost, the cushioning system used on this isn’t as springy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe to walk in
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after playing a round in my other shoes and walking the full 18 with a push cart. My other shoes are very comfortable for a full round riding in a cart, but not what I wanted for walking the whole course. These are very comfortable, supportive and traction is great. No issues with walking a full 18 holes or more in the same day. They are a bit tough to get on considering they don't have normal laces however, I expected this with my purchase. They look great and am very pleased with how they look and the comfort level I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Hillbilly Jedi

customer_reviews.title: SIZE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! EXCEPT when I tried them on in my house they were tight at the toe but I thought they would be okay as the rest of the fit is super snug and I love the look. After one game of golf my big toe is bruised from being to tight at the end of the shoe. I have never ever worn a size 11 and these are 10 1/2. I can't return them because I wore them once and have to toss them. Its my fault but these are way way smaller than a normal size. Great shoe though if you can get the fit right!!1
customer_reviews.author: david allsopp

customer_reviews.title: Great golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This golf shoe is perfect. Extremely comfortable and feels great. I was worried about the traction with them being spike-less but I was very surprised with how much traction I had. I would say these are definitely best for courses that are well manicured and dryer. I live in New England and they worked great on the courses that are well maintained! I cannot say what they're like on a mid level rated course yet. I also got numerous compliments on them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended this shoe from a family expert. I first purchased a size 7m which is my normal size. Did not feel right even though the specs would say they would. I got the 7.5m and it fit exactly as I had imagined. They are a little firm to get on, but once on, they are the most comfortable shoes that I own. I have been wearing them in this cold winter and they are always comfortable and keep my feet dry. I really should buy a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable golf shoes i ever wore. Tight to get on, great support and comfortable right out of the box. They are sturdy, supportive and as easy to wear as slippers. I had Ecco golf shoes and loved them, these are next level. And the red is absolutely fun
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but try it for yourself. It’s Prime so it’s returnable with no problem
customer_reviews.text: Overall I loved the shoe. It was a bit too small for me and if you have high arches as I do getting them on is a bit of a struggle. Just because they did not work for me is no reason not to try them for yourself. Once I got them on they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality and wanted to love them but they have two issues for my feet. I wear a wide in some shoes regular in others. These are the right length but very tight around the middle and the ankle is tiny and hard to slip on. The ankle is so tight it makes my foot tingle.
customer_reviews.author: Frank - NJ

customer_reviews.title: more for older men
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my son and it arrived on time as usual, however, it was too narrow and stiff plus it looks like old men shoe. returned all 2 pairs and bought another style better suited for a middle school child. p.s. i chose these due to the utlra-boost cushion and the lack of laces but it was not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: as an old man with bad knees and back these are the best golfing shoes i have evey worn... and i bought them on an Amazon special for $39.99... which was an amazing deal... even more reason to smile every time i tee it up...
customer_reviews.author: J P K

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe for Walking
customer_reviews.text: I really like Adidas golf shoes with bounce soles. I always walk when I play and they are extremely comfortable. I think these will be good summer shoes since they are knit.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Ming

customer_reviews.title: You may want to consider a different pair.
customer_reviews.text: Truly wanted CodeChaos, bu td isn’t want to spend $130. Settled on these. Thought they would be way more comfortable than they are. Heel of shoe is very stiff and tore my Achilles to shreds.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and airy.
customer_reviews.text: Like these shoes, like a sock, easier to get on with shoe horn. Standing up well after 2 months, golf about 3 to 4 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo47

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoes EVER
customer_reviews.text: I don't ever write reviews but I will this time to help those who suffer the same pain walking the golf courses in crappy expensive shoes. I have no problem walking several times a week golfing in these, uphills and downhills. The grip is comparable to shoes with spikes. Have not tried in wet conditions but I avoid swampy days anyways. Highly recommended if you are looking for something breathable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy with surprisingly good traction. Run a little small and the elastic around the ankle takes a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.text: i own three pairs of these, absolutely love them. The size does vary slightly but they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are the most comfortable pair I have ever owned. They look great and were at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Al A.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've played about 36 holes in these shoes so far, they're very comfortable and stable. I was worried that they wouldn't provide the support that other golf shoes do, but they're as good as any other shoes I've owned (Ecco, footjoy, Nike, puma). I'm worried that the velcro won't hold up, but that's a generic worry, there's nothing that indicates it will fail.
customer_reviews.author: Cam80

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable! I am a size 11D. Very standard size foot and the shoe is just a little snug. So if you have a wide foot at all I’d recommend sizing up or getting wide if they offer it. Golfed 18 in 90+ degree weather and didn’t get too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Craig N.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and style. No issues while walking 18 holes, first time out!
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Runs ridiculously narrow. I mean like ruby slippers narrow. Moving up a whole size didn’t even help. Looks like they might be comfortable, but had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks Yeilding

customer_reviews.title: Adidas are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits good really comfortable. Top material scratches leg if your socks aren’t above the top of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Polinice

customer_reviews.title: Good silhouette, but comparatively stiff Boost and narrow toe-box
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly wide feet, and this shoe really cramped my forefoot in a few minutes. The Boost midsole isn't as springy and cushy as on a Pureboost Go or an Ultraboost. The rugged outsole is a nice touch for outdoor activities, even though it is marketed as a golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: Easy on easy off cushy.
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for the first time today since it dried out here. Cushy and a nice grip. I don’t know how they breathe, because it’s still cool. Overall I’m liking them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Burris128

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Other than being a little difficult to put on, this spikeless golf shoe is fantastic and as comfortable as a pair of slippers.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Boost cushioning not at soft as other Adidas products. Decent lateral support, but could use better arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Joel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are excellent, light weight, and very flexible. I would suggest order a half size smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: JClark716

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Unique look with the wrap around Velcro but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Unique look with the wrap around Velcro but a nice shoe
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable pair of golf shoes I have ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR GOLF
customer_reviews.text: used for playing golf. very comfortable. a little hard to put on but I am 79 years old.
customer_reviews.author: daved

customer_reviews.title: Shopping Amazon , in the comfort of my sofa
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable and best fitting golf shoes I've purchased. I have a narrow foot and a small foot and this is the only pair of shoes that I was able to find that fit me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Being of advanced age (old) I bought these shoes thinking they would be easy to put on and off. I treied one time and never tried again. I should have returned them but I just forgot about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and look otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Fit smaller/tighter than expected but not uncomfortably. Great feel and look otherwise. I look forward to breaking them in this weekend. Adidas almost never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Lerma

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Another shoe that is not good for a high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Karl R.

customer_reviews.title: Snug.
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little snug vs other boost models. I’d go 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out the box on to the links no problem.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, breathable and grip the ground no break in necessary
customer_reviews.author: Don Almerico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our son and HE LOVES IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice comfortable golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: It snugs tightly to your feet. The laceless feature is so convenient you never hv to worry about tightening the lace in the middle of golf outing.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the shoes and delivery service. Arrived earlier than expected. Shoes and Box both im good condition when it arrived. Comfortable feel and fit same with my other Boosts.
customer_reviews.author: defyeo

customer_reviews.title: Size problems
customer_reviews.text: Def not true to size unless your not wearing socks then they are good
customer_reviews.author: Jason Folse

customer_reviews.title: 2 rights make a wrong
customer_reviews.text: The size runs slightly small. Also, I received 2 right foot shoes. Cool shoe, my left foot is jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Scheuplein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, super comfy. Feels like I’m playing in a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: Pretty dang comfortable. Shoe seems to run slightly narrow, maybe just my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Birdie
customer_reviews.text: Solid golf show, feet stay planted. Very comfortable. I get comments on the course for style.
customer_reviews.author: William Nicol

customer_reviews.title: wrong size in box
customer_reviews.text: these shoes were in a box marked size 11- the actual product was size 15-
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: They fit very well, which is a major issue when it comes to golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are better than i actually expected. Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: My dad really liked this birthday present since he got them in April
customer_reviews.text: My dad really liked this birthday present since he got them in April, just that he can only wear thinner socks to fit in them. But I always know Adidas's size tends to be smaller than the average.
customer_reviews.author: yickming

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design. The upper of the shoe feels like ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. The upper of the shoe feels like it made of razor blades. Not what I expect from adidas
customer_reviews.author: noah dipasquale

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 10.5 but ordered a size 11 & it fit perfect..... very comfortable and stable.... can't wait to take them out on the course and off .... very satisfied with all my Adidas shoes & apparel
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes ever purchased. Definitely purchase another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Crossknit 2.0 Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Spikeless golf shoe incorporates full-length boost midsole foam for unrivaled cushioning and endless energy.
feature_bullets: Circleknit upper material is specially engineered for golf footwear and features superior breathability and stretch comfort while providing golf specific lateral stability
Elastic closure bands offer enhanced on/off convenience and style while the external TPU heel counter and forefoot PU welds add stability and performance
Advanced pure motion outsole with strategically placed adiwear traction provides great stability, grip, and performance
Torsion system to stabilize foot while walking and swinging
Cloud foam EVA sock liner provides enhanced support and cushioning fit foam geo collar foam for enhanced cushioning and comfort
